name: Imaginary Gaming Inc.
description: We are the greatest game developer team in the WORLD, you should be aware of our existence already as we made the one and only Untitled game before even Christ was born!

children.name: Virtual Realities Ltd.
children.description: Pioneering the virtual world with our cutting-edge VR experiences. Immerse yourself in a reality beyond imagination.

children.name: Pixel Perfect Studios
children.description: Crafting pixel art games that are a feast for the eyes and a joy to play. Every pixel counts.

children.name: Epic Journeys Interactive
children.description: Creating epic adventures and stories that captivate and inspire. Your next journey begins here.

children.name: Quantum Leap Games
children.description: Taking gaming to the next level with our innovative mechanics and quantum-powered narratives.

children.name: Infinite Loop Studios
children.description: Developing endlessly enjoyable games that keep players coming back for more.

children.name: Mythical Games Inc.
children.description: Bringing myths and legends to life through immersive storytelling and captivating gameplay.

children.name: Galactic Adventures
children.description: Exploring the universe, one game at a time. Join us on our galactic adventures.

children.name: Retro Revolution Games
children.description: Reviving classic gaming with a modern twist. Nostalgia meets innovation.

children.name: Mystic Realms
children.description: Dive into mystical realms filled with wonder, magic, and adventure. Uncover the secrets of the unknown.

children.name: Cyberpunk Creations
children.description: Crafting dystopian futures and cyberpunk fantasies. Enter the neon-lit world of tomorrow.

children.name: Dreamweaver Studios
children.description: Weaving dreams into reality with our enchanting games. Let your imagination soar.
